resources.string: Do you want to delete this word?
Word saved to your word list:

To use this dictionary app, simply enter a word in the search bar at the top and press the Search button. The app will display definitions fetched from the online dictionary. \n\nIf you wish to save a word and its definitions for later review, you can click on the Save button after searching for a word. Your saved words can be accessed in the Word List section.
